description:
The 185 Merino Way To Powder T-Shirt for men is perfect for athletic winter tours, even when the going gets tough.

It is made of 100% merino wool with extremely fine fibers feel soft and comfortable on the skin. Wool is ideal for endurance sports thanks to its temperature and moisture-regulating properties. As always, their merino wool comes from selected Tasmanian farms, where their sheep enjoy an almost boundless habitat in a moderate climate. These optimum living conditions result in the high quality and functionality of the fine wool.

Stylish and color conscious, their long sleeve is available in on-trend colors with a cool print. The 185 Merino Way To Powder T-Shirt for men is extremely versatile and an absolute must for your tours!
name: Ortovox 185 Merino Way To Powder T-Shirt - Mens
